concept.title: Amazon S3
concept.shortdesc: The Amazon S3 destination writes data to Amazon S3.

conbody.p: Amazon S3 destinationoverviewdestinationsAmazon S3The destination creates a file for each batch of data written to the Amazon S3. Output files use the following naming convention: <prefix>-<longtimestamp>-<counter>
You can configure the prefix. The destination uses "sdc" by default.
You can optionally use a proxy user and compress data with gzip when writing to Amazon S3.
